thread.title: BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.38

title: BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.38
text: 12 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.38 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Financial Engines Inc: * FINANCIAL ENGINES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $125.7 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $510 MILLION TO $530 MILLION * SEES 2018 GAAP NET INCOME WILL BE IN RANGE OF $75 MILLION TO $85 MILLION * ‍2018 NON-GAAP ADJUSTED EBITDA WILL BE IN RANGE OF $166 MILLION TO $180 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
